narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a focused inspection for the "direct" non-compliant items cited under sections 2.40 (b)(2) and 3.78 (b)
included on the report for the inspection conducted on March 19, 2014.  The coatimundi had been examined by a
veterinarian.  The Grivet Monkeys and the Ringtail Lemurs had been moved to enclosures inside a building that met
the temperature requirement.
 
The focused inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
